N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 22, subtit. D, ch. VI, Application for an order to terminate or sever lease or rental agreement - Application for an order to terminate or sever lease or rental agreement

State Regulations
CPL Article 530, RPL ยง 227-c Application
for an Order to Terminate or Sever Lease or Rental Agreement
________ COURT
COUNTY OF ________: PART ________
[CITY, TOWN, VILLAGE OF ________]
________ x

The People of the State of New York Docket No. ________
-against- Indictment No. ________
________, Defendant. In the matter of the Application of
APPLICATION FOR AN ORDER TO
TERMINATE OR SEVER LEASE OR
RENTAL AGREEMENT
________, Lessee/tenant
-against-
________, Landlord(s), and/or
________, Co-tenant(s). ________ x
TO THE ________ COURT: 1. I am the above captioned lessee/tenant and
am applying to this court for an order: terminating the lease or rental agreement, and/or
severing the co-tenancy
at the following address: _____________________
specify address of subject premises, including
apartment number, if any
2. I am a person protected by: an order of protection; a temporary order of protection; issued by this Court in the above captioned
criminal proceeding. The order protects me and/or my children against the above
captioned defendant. The order expires on ________. specify date
3. The defendant [check all boxes that
apply]: resides in the subject premises; resided in the subject premises until
[specify] ________; is named as a tenant or co-tenant on the lease
or rental agreement; is a subtenant of all or part of the subject
premises. If so, the primary tenant is ________; is not named in the lease but may have a right
or claim to reside in or occupy the subject premises as a result of my having
occupied the premises; none of the above. 4. The lease or rental agreement regarding the
subject premises [ is] [ is not] the subject of litigation in a housing, matrimonial, criminal or any other proceeding in any other court. [If it is the
subject of litigation, specify the court, status of case and docket or index
number, if available]: 5. Despite the order or temporary order of
protection, I believe that if I remain in the subject premises I and/or my
children will remain at substantial risk of physical or emotional harm from the
defendant. I believe that if I am permitted to terminate my obligations on this
lease or rental agreement, this risk will be substantially reduced. 6. I offer the following facts and
circumstances in support of my application: [specify the facts supporting the
application, including names and ages of children, if any]: 7. On ________, I made an oral a written
request to the landlord/owner to voluntarily
specify date
consent to terminate my lease or rental
agreement, but: the landlord has not responded to my request; or
the landlord refused to consent on
______
specify date. 8. I am the only person named on the lease or
rental agreement as tenant or lessee. In addition to me, the following person(s) are
named as co-tenants or co-lessees on the lease or rental agreement: _______________
specify names of co-tenants or co-lessees; and, a. The above-named co-tenant(s) or
co-lessee(s) have all consented to the termination of the lease or rental
agreement. OR
b. The following co-tenant(s) or co-lessee(s)
refused to consent to the termination of the lease or rental agreement
[specify]: ________. OR
c. The following co-tenant(s) or co-lessee(s)
has/have not responded as to the termination of the lease or rental agreement
[specify]: ________. 9. In addition to any persons who may have
been named in paragraph 8: there are not other adults 18 or older
residing in or occupying the premises. the following adults 18 and older reside in or
occupy the premises. [For each person, state whether s/he has consented to
vacate the premises and, if so, when]: I do not know of anyone 18 or over who has a
right or claim to reside in or occupy the premises. although the following people 18 or older do
not reside in or occupy the premises, they may have a right, or claim to have a
right, or claim to reside in or occupy the premises. [For each person, state
whether s/he has waived those possible rights or claims and consents to the
termination or severance of the lease]: 10. I have fully met my obligation to pay rent and
other payments due on the lease or rental agreement up to ________, specify date
and will pay all further rent and other
payments due from me up until the date specified by this Court for termination
of the lease or rental agreement or severance of my obligation. I have not paid rent or other payments due on
the lease or rental agreement since
________. specify date

The following amounts are due and owing to
date
________. specify amount owed
I will pay this amount, as well as rent and
other payments due from me up until the date specified by this Court for
termination of the lease or rental agreement or severance of my obligation as
follows: 11. Other than the person against whom the
order or temporary order of protection was issued, the leasehold
premises: were delivered to the landlord free of all
occupants as of ________. specify date
will be delivered to the landlord free of all
occupants as of ________. specify date
12. Other than the person against whom the
order or temporary order of protection was issued, the leasehold
premises: were left to the co-tenant free of all other
occupants as of ________. specify date
will be left to the co-tenant free of all
other occupants as of ________. specify date
13. No prior application has been made for the
relief requested in this motion, except: WHEREFORE, I respectfully request this Court
issue an order: terminating my lease or rental
agreement; severing me from the co-tenancy; and
terminating my obligation to pay any rent or other payments on the lease or
rental agreement from the date specified by the Court in the order; sealing this petition, any orders issued by
this Court in connection therewith and the record of this proceeding and
prohibiting disclosure to anyone not a party to this petition except by order
of this Court [state reasons why sealing should be ordered]: And for such other and further relief as the

Court may deem just and proper. ___________
Signature of Attorney (if any)
___________
Print Name
___________
Address and Telephone Number
___________
Signature of Lessee/Tenant
___________
Print Name
___________
Address and Telephone Number
___________
Date
VERIFICATION
STATE OF NEW YORK)
):ss: COUNTY OF)
being duly sworn, says that (s)he is the

Lessee/Tenant in the above named proceeding and that the foregoing application
is true to (his)(her) own knowledge, except as to matters therein stated to be
alleged on information and belief and as to those matters (s)he believes it to
be true. ______________
Lessee/Tenant

Sworn to before me this day of. ________
(Deputy) Clerk of the Court
